title: Bit9 + Carbon Black Appoints Joe Tibbetts to Board of Directors
content: WALTHAM, Mass., Sept. 15, 2015 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Bit9® + Carbon Black®, the market leader in endpoint threat prevention, detection and response, today announced the appointment of Joe Tibbetts to its board of directors. The company also named Tibbetts chairman of the board's audit committee.
